sp_widget.name: homepage widget
sp_widget.template:
Travel Card Top-up System

Seamlessly request top-ups and track approvals at each stage.

Request Top-up

If you have a valid visa and travel card, click below to raise a new top-up request.

Employee

TDM/Account Manager

HR Team

Finance Team

sys_update_version.name: sp_widget_7c815eef472a2a1046f7b3f4116d431b
sys_update_version.payload: customc.travel-home-container { font-family: 'Segoe UI', Tahoma, Geneva, Verdana, sans-serif; } .travel-hero-banner { background: linear-gradient(rgba(0, 102, 102, 0.6), rgba(0, 102, 102, 0.6)), url('https://img.freepik.com/premium-vector/online-flight-booking-app-mobile-phone-air-ticket-reservation-smartphone-screen-booking-airplane-flight-internet-service-airline-ticket-buying-flat-vector-illustration_493806-5331.jpg') center/cover no-repeat; color: #fff; text-align: center; padding: 60px 20px; border-radius: 16px; } .travel-hero-banner h1 { font-size: 32px; margin-bottom: 10px; } .travel-hero-banner p { font-size: 18px; } .action-card { background: #ffffff; margin: -40px auto 30px auto; padding: 30px; max-width: 500px; border-radius: 12px; box-shadow: 0 6px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); text-align: center; position: relative; z-index: 10; } .action-card .card-content i { font-size: 40px; color: #009999; margin-bottom: 10px; } .action-card .card-content h2 { margin: 10px 0; color: #006666; } .action-card .card-content p { color: #555; margin-bottom: 20px; } .action-card button { background-color: #009999; color: #fff; border: none; padding: 12px 25px; border-radius: 8px; cursor: pointer; font-size: 16px; transition: background-color 0.3s ease; } .action-card button:hover { background-color: #007777; } .process-tracker { display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; margin-top: 40px; flex-wrap: wrap; } .process-tracker .step { display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; text-align: center; } .process-tracker .step i { font-size: 28px; color: #009999; margin-bottom: 5px; } .process-tracker .step p { font-size: 14px; color: #333; } .process-tracker .tracker-line { width: 30px; height: 2px; background-color: #009999; margin: 0 10px; } sp_instancefalsehomepage_widgetfalsehomepage widgetfalsefalsesp_widgetadmin2025-07-11 11:03:057c815eef472a2a1046f7b3f4116d431b1homepage widget0c19c259476a6a1046f7b3f4116d43580c19c259476a6a1046f7b3f4116d4358sp_widget_7c815eef472a2a1046f7b3f4116d431badmin2025-07-11 11:43:13
